overview: It's a tough world with jobs. Taebaek Lee, a young white man, is only looking for a comfortable job that pays a lot of money. He spends a lot of money on his kind girlfriend and cheats on him. Then, he gets a job at a company that handles corpse items and odor cleaning... Here is the story of Lee Tae-baek, a young man of our time, growing into a better adult.
title: Holy Workers
